Bacterial_Spot.name: Tomato Bacterial Spot
Bacterial_Spot.cause: Bacterial disease caused by Xanthomonas perforans.
Bacterial_Spot.prevention: Use resistant varieties, manage water levels, and apply bactericides.
Bacterial_Spot.organic_pesticides: Neem oil, Garlic extract, Baking soda spray.

Early_Blight.name: Tomato Early Blight
Early_Blight.cause: Fungal disease caused by Alternaria solani.
Early_Blight.prevention: Use resistant varieties, remove infected leaves, and apply fungicides.
Early_Blight.organic_pesticides: Neem oil, Copper sulfate, Bordeaux mixture.

Late_Blight.name: Tomato Late Blight
Late_Blight.cause: Fungal disease caused by Phytophthora infestans.
Late_Blight.prevention: Use resistant varieties, manage moisture levels, and apply fungicides.
Late_Blight.organic_pesticides: Bordeaux mixture, Neem oil, Garlic extract.

Leaf_Mold.name: Tomato Leaf Mold
Leaf_Mold.cause: Fungal disease caused by Passalora fulva.
Leaf_Mold.prevention: Ensure good air circulation and apply fungicides.
Leaf_Mold.organic_pesticides: Neem oil, Sulfur spray, Baking soda spray.
Leaf_Mold.natural_fertilizers: Seaweed fertilizer, Cow dung manure, Compost.

Mosaic_Virus.name: Tomato Mosaic Virus
Mosaic_Virus.cause: Viral disease caused by Tomato mosaic virus.
Mosaic_Virus.prevention: Use virus-free seeds, control insect vectors, and remove infected plants.
Mosaic_Virus.medicines: No specific medicines; manage with prevention and control measures.
Mosaic_Virus.organic_pesticides: Neem oil, Garlic extract, Chrysanthemum extract.

Septoria_Leaf_Spot.name: Tomato Septoria Leaf Spot
Septoria_Leaf_Spot.cause: Fungal disease caused by Septoria lycopersici.
Septoria_Leaf_Spot.prevention: Remove infected leaves, use resistant varieties, and apply fungicides.
Septoria_Leaf_Spot.organic_pesticides: Neem oil, Copper-based fungicides, Baking soda spray.

Spider_Mites.name: Tomato Spider Mites (Two-spotted Spider Mite)
Spider_Mites.prevention: Use miticides and natural predators, maintain plant health.
Spider_Mites.organic_pesticides: Neem oil, Chrysanthemum extract, Soap spray.

Target_Spot.name: Tomato Target Spot
Target_Spot.cause: Fungal disease caused by Corynespora cassiicola.
Target_Spot.prevention: Remove infected plant debris, use resistant varieties, and apply fungicides.
Target_Spot.organic_pesticides: Neem oil, Copper-based fungicides, Garlic extract.

Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.name: Tomato Yellow Leaf Curl Virus
Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.cause: Viral disease caused by Tomato yellow leaf curl virus.
Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.prevention: Use resistant varieties, control whitefly vectors, and remove infected plants.
Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.medicines: No specific medicines; manage with prevention and control measures.
Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus.organic_pesticides: Neem oil, Chrysanthemum extract, Soap spray.
